Text:
From what I understand the sound effects don't start until the the 7th episode called "Day of the Robot." This torrent is actually the 2nd pilot film,there are 3 pilots in all.So I guess that would actually make the sound effects in the 4th episode.
I get this info from what someone is selling on ebay it has a list of every episode for SMDM as well as TBW.
http://cgi.ebay.com/The-Six-6-Million-Dollar-Man-Bionic-Woman-Series-DVD_W0QQitemZ6420742978QQcategoryZ617QQssPageNameZWDVWQQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem

>>Does it have the sound effects we know and love?
I should have mentioned it.. it hasn't.. :-(( Actually, I downloaded it just for that reason, but no tv episode was available, I took this movie.. They must have integrated these effects later on (in the series).
If you're eager to hear that sound only, the torrent isn't probably worth it. But it's a stylish 70's (or 80's?) movie, I enjoyed it. But as far as I remember, the pilot (0x01 - Cyborg) was better..
Does it have the sound effects we know and love?
I loved this series so anything that I can find is appreciated. I liked the first one you uploaded a lot. So did my brother I burned him a copy.
please seed,im at 98%and would love to see this again,thanks.
Any chance of getting a seed for this?  There's a half dozen or so of us stuck at 97.2%.  We'd all appreciate it muchly

Hope there are some leechers left. I haven't visited tpb for long, so I didn't notice this torrent died.
I'll try to come up with the file later tonight.
